tossup_question: 3) EARTH AND SPACE   Which element is known to be present on the lunar surface?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Tritium
X) Tungsten
Y) Titanium
Z) None of the above
bonus_question: 3) EARTH AND SPACE  Which of the following is NOT correctly matched?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Isohel: A line representing points receiving equal amounts of sunshine
X) Isohyet: A line representing points of equal precipitation
Y) Isogonal: A line representing points of equal depth under water
Z) Isothere: A line representing points of equal mean temperature in summer
bonus_answer:
ANSWER: Y) ISOGONAL. 
Isogonal is a line which represents points of equal magnetic declination
